decks.notes: This deck focuses on playing aggressively with a diverse range of creature threats, leveraging the power of both multicolored spells and the companion mechanic. By utilizing powerful creatures like Ragavan, Nimble Pilferer and Nishoba Brawler alongside efficient removal spells like Lightning Bolt, the deck aims to pressure opponents quickly and efficiently. The inclusion of Jegantha, the Wellspring as a companion adds an extra layer of consistency and flexibility to the deck. With a mix of creature aggression and versatile spell options, this deck aims to overwhelm opponents and secure victories through aggressive plays.

This deck focuses on assembling a toolbox of creatures to find answers and win conditions through combo interactions. By using cards like Chord of Calling and Urza's Saga, the deck can tutor specific creatures to fit the situation. The deck aims to generate value and synergy by utilizing cards like Nadu, Winged Wisdom and Springheart Nantuko. It also includes protection and disruption elements like Sylvan Safekeeper and Teferi, Time Raveler to ensure the combo can go off smoothly. The deck aims to be flexible and adaptable to different matchups by utilizing various creatures and combo pieces.

This deck aims to quickly disrupt the opponent's strategy with hand disruption spells like Thoughtseize and Grief, while maintaining pressure with aggressive creatures like Orcish Bowmasters and Dauthi Voidwalker. The inclusion of Urza's Saga allows for additional creature tokens and important artifacts like Mishra's Bauble. The deck also includes removal spells like Fatal Push to deal with threats and Nihil Spellbomb for graveyard hate. Overall, the deck's strategy is to overwhelm the opponent with a combination of early disruption and aggressive threats.

This deck focuses on an aggressive strategy utilizing creatures with high power and toughness for their mana cost. It includes efficient creatures like Scion of Draco, Nishoba Brawler, and Territorial Kavu, along with burn spells like Lightning Bolt and Tribal Flames to control the board and finish off opponents. Leyline cards provide additional support for the aggressive game plan. The companion Jegantha, the Wellspring is included for additional flexibility and power. The mana base is optimized for consistency and allows for casting spells of various colors.

The deck focuses on maximizing early aggression and disruption through a combination of efficient creatures like Ragavan, Nimble Pilferer and Tarmogoyf, alongside disruptive spells like Inquisition of Kozilek and Thoughtseize. The inclusion of cards like Orcish Bowmasters and Molten Collapse allows for additional removal options and controlling the board. The deck also utilizes the synergies of Mishra's Bauble and Urza's Saga for card advantage and efficiency. Wrenn and Six provides additional value and Boseiju, Who Endures offers protection for key spells. Overall, the deck aims to apply early pressure and disrupt the opponent's game plan.

This deck focuses on aggressive play with low-cost creatures and disruptive spells to control the board and quickly deal damage to the opponent. It utilizes cards like Ragavan, Nimble Pilferer and Grief to apply pressure early on, while also using Thoughtseize and Dauthi Voidwalker to disrupt the opponent's game plan. The deck also includes removal spells like Fatal Push and Terminate to deal with opponent threats. Overall, the goal is to maintain board control, disrupt the opponent, and win the game quickly through aggro tactics.

The deck focuses on controlling the game through countering spells, removal, and card advantage. It utilizes powerful cards like Snapcaster Mage and Tamiyo, Inquisitive Student to support its control strategy. The deck includes a mix of counterspells, removal spells like Lightning Bolt, and card draw like Preordain to maintain control. Additionally, it includes some unique cards like Subtlety, Invert Polarity, and Flame of Anor to further disrupt the opponent's game plan. Overall, the deck aims to outvalue and outmaneuver the opponent to secure a victory.

This Boros Aggro deck focuses on quick and efficient creature and burn spells to deal damage to the opponent as fast as possible. It also makes use of cards like Static Prison and Unstable Amulet to control the board and protect its creatures. The inclusion of Jegantha as a companion adds an extra layer of consistency to the deck. With a mix of aggressive creatures like Amped Raptor and Ragavan, Nimble Pilferer, along with powerful spells like Lightning Bolt and Galvanic Discharge, this deck aims to overwhelm the opponent and win the game quickly.

The main focus of this deck is to use powerful, high-impact creatures like Death's Shadow and Murktide Regent to quickly apply pressure and overwhelm opponents in a short amount of time. Utilizing a mix of efficient removal spells, disruption, and card selection, the deck aims to disrupt the opponent's game plan while presenting a fast clock to finish the game. By combining aggressive creature threats with versatile control elements, the deck seeks to create a challenging board state that demands a quick response from opposing decks in the Modern format.

This deck focuses on using various control and removal spells to disrupt the opponent's game plan while slowly building up to play The One Ring, which acts as a win condition. The deck also includes a mix of counterspells, board wipes, and card draw to help maintain control of the game. Additionally, it includes a few utility lands to provide additional benefits and flexibility in different situations. The goal is to outlast the opponent and ultimately overpower them with the powerful effects of The One Ring.

The key concept of the deck is to quickly and aggressively play out creatures and burn spells to deal damage to the opponent. By utilizing mana-efficient spells like Lightning Bolt and Lava Dart, along with prowess creatures like Monastery Swiftspear and Dragon's Rage Channeler, the deck can consistently apply pressure and finish off opponents quickly. Additionally, cards like Ragavan, Nimble Pilferer and Slickshot Show-Off provide additional value and card advantage to help maintain momentum throughout the game. The mana base is optimized to support the aggressive game plan and ensure consistent access to the necessary colors of mana.

This deck focuses on using the UrzaTron lands to ramp up quickly and play powerful Eldrazi creatures and artifacts to control the game. The key strategy is to assemble the UrzaTron lands as quickly as possible to play big threats like Emrakul, the World Anew and Karn, the Great Creator. The deck also utilizes cards like Chalice of the Void, Trinisphere, and All Is Dust to disrupt the opponent's game plan. With a mix of powerful creatures and disruptive spells, the deck aims to outvalue and outmaneuver the opponent.
